sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import Navbar from './../Components/Navbar';
import { Announcement } from './../Components/Announcement';
import styled from 'styled-components';

const Container = styled.div``

const Item = () => {
    return (
        <Container>
            <Navbar />
            <Announcement />
            <Wrapper>
                <ImageContainer>
                    <Image></Image>
                </ImageContainer>
                <DescContainer>
                    <Title></Title>
                    <Desc>Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Sunt doloribus illo autem magni eum magnam in, quia, repudiandae iusto id distinctio. Sed, id est? Porro ut officia saepe molestiae, aliquid vitae ratione blanditiis harum sit reprehenderit repellendus hic error autem dolores beatae inventore quo perferendis iste delectus asperiores? Eaque, eligendi.</Desc>
                    <Price></Price>
                    <Specification>
                        <ColorContainer>
                            <Text></Text>
                            <Color></Color>
                            <Color></Color>
                            <Color></Color>
                        </ColorContainer>
                        <SizeContainer>
                            <Text></Text>
                            <Select>
                                <Option></Option>
                                <Option></Option>
                                <Option></Option>
                                <Option></Option>
                                <Option></Option>
                            </Select>
                        </SizeContainer>
                    </Specification>
                    <ButtonContainer>
                        <NoOfItems>
                        <SignedButton>_</SignedButton>
                        <Text>1</Text>
                        <SignedButton>+</SignedButton>
                        </NoOfItems>
                        <CartButtonContainer>
                            <Button>ADD TO CART</Button>
                        </CartButtonContainer>
                    </ButtonContainer>
                </DescContainer>
            </Wrapper>
        </Container>
    )
}

export default Item
